description: Detects the execution of a renamed office binaries
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
name: Renamed Office Binary Execution
query: (((winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("Excel.exe" OR "MSACCESS.EXE" OR "OneNote.exe" OR "POWERPNT.EXE" OR "WinWord.exe")) OR (winlog.event_data.Description:("Microsoft Access" OR "Microsoft Excel" OR "Microsoft OneNote" OR "Microsoft PowerPoint" OR "Microsoft Word"))) AND (NOT (process.executable.text:(*\\EXCEL.exe OR *\\MSACCESS.exe OR *\\ONENOTE.EXE OR *\\POWERPNT.EXE OR *\\WINWORD.exe))))
